title: In-Depth Understanding of Reproductive Physiology: Time-Compressed Animation-Based Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational biology and physiology knowledge
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning environment utilizing time-compressed animation with 3D visualization (TCAD) for advanced reproductive physiology education targeting general citizens

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the 3D structure of reproductive organs and hormone regulation mechanisms via TCAD (Technology-Enhanced Computer-Aided Design) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can recreate and analyze key phenomena in gamete formation (spermatogenesis/oogenesis) through animations with 75% accuracy.

By connecting real-world reproductive physiology cases (infertility, menstrual cycle disorders, etc.) to TCAD learning content, learners achieve over 80% proficiency in three or more formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
